mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stores_info_basic( store_idx, store_name, corp_reg_number, president_name, biz_type, biz_topics, zip_code, address, service_region, service_local_area, main_telephone, person_in_charge, contract_number, store_type, approval_status, registered_date, approved_date ) VALUES ( #{idx}, #{storeName}, #{corpRegNumber}, #{presidentName}, #{bizType}, #{bizTopic}, #{zipCode}, #{address}, #{serviceRegion}, #{serviceLocalArea}, #{mainTelephone}, #{personInCharge}, #{contactNumber}, #{storeType}, #{approvalStatus}, #{registeredDate}, #{approvedDate} )
mapper.select: select st.id, st.idx, auth.password from stores st left join stores_authentication auth on auth.store_idx = st.idx where st.id = #{userName};
